name: CODE H.O.R.D.O.R
description:
Welcome! You are a Trash picking droid enlisted on a mission, which is CODE H.O.R.D.O.R (Don't ask me what that stands for)

Using Future Technology, you can compress trash, and use it as an explosive! Use left and right arrow keys or A and D keys to move left and right. Your Trash compactor/Exploder will automatically do its job.

Get a highscore, and unlock different color palettes for your effort!

Can you get to 100?

Made with HTML 5 and Javascript

This game was made for the Blackthornprod game jam,  with the theme "LESS IS MORE"

Your client complains that he can't get anything done, because of the sheer amount of things he has. By clearing it, you are proving that less is indeed more.
The game also uses only two colors, and only shapes; no sprites. The simplistic art-style is also based on the theme :D

All code, art, music and sound effects were made during the jam. The font is Consolas.
